summary.overallFindings: Abbott Laboratories demonstrates comprehensive and concrete responsible AI practices across all seven pillars. The company provides detailed public documentation on transparency, fairness, explainability, oversight, privacy, governance, and public commitments, supported by policies, sustainability reports, and technical white papers. These sources collectively reflect a mature and well-documented approach to responsible AI, with no significant gaps identified in any evaluated area.
